Articles.Content:
I dont have the time to set up a proper mining rig (or hack one for that matter) 

could someone tell me - are mining resources (ore) limited?

IE I part a drill somewhere, but have to move it after filling up half a tank in order to get more ore...
Nope, abundance based, they do not deplete

> 
> Nope, abundance based, they do not deplete

thank you
